## About This Project

Welcome to ISSS 608 Visual Analytics and Application Group 1's project! Our project is about designing a dashboard for hotel operators to view different operations-impactful variables for actionable insights related to their business.

Link to the Application: [Hotel-Viz](https://hotel-viz.shinyapps.io/hotel_viz/) (Or navigate through the directory on the top)
